text: Angelica J. Ortiz Irizarry (born January 25, 1988) is a female water polo player from Puerto Rico. She participated at the 2007 World Aquatics Championships, 2006 Central American and Caribbean Games, and 2011 Pan American Games. == References == == Other websites == * amy-hetzel-of- australia-is-challenged-by-angelica-j-ortiz getty * Amy Hetzel and Angelica J. title: Angelica Ortiz
